home.headline: Welcome to K2 Informatics GmbH
home.mainContent: You will find some information about us here. We will be happy to explain you in concrete terms what we can do for you. Call us or send us an email.
home.serviceShortText: Quickly and conveniently solved an IT problem...
home.solutionShortText: The secure handling of data is the basis for any information...
home.companiesShortText: The market and your business is changing faster and faster...

services.headline: Services
services.mainContent: Then we would like to do our part, either as an advisor or as we implement a solution for you and, if you wish, we can also do it for you.

firstRow.title: You want...
list: Quickly and conveniently an IT problem
Expand or renew your information system
Consolidate your operational knowledge and gain an overview

secondRow.title: And thereby..
list: Protect and continue to use your previous investments
Increase the productivity of your processes
Improve the transparency of the system
Maintain continuity and proceed step by step

thirdRow.title: Consultation
thirdRow.content: We bring theoretical foundations and ways of working into our projects, but put a lot of emphasis on experience (yours and ours), proportionality, common sense, your own competence and teamwork.
list: We offer the following consulting services:
Advice on IT issues related to own and third party products
Advice on technical, organizational and work-psychological issues
Development of requirement profiles, IT concepts and strategies
Create test concepts and conduct tests on your behalf
Conception of communication, information and knowledge platforms

fourthRow.title: Engineering und Entwicklung
fourthRow.content: Wir realisieren IT-Projekte zu fixen Preisen und Terminen, als Generalunternehmer oder als Komponenten-Lieferant.
list: Konzeption und Realisierung von neuen Applikationen

fifthRow.title: Unsere aktive Unterstützung bei Ihnen im Betrieb
fifthRow.content: Wir arbeiten gerne in Ihrem Betrieb mit
list: bei der Formalisierung und Verteilung von Wissen
Mitarbeit beim Betrieb von Applikationen oder Teilen davon
während der Einführung einer neuen Lösung

Diese Art von Support erlaubt uns eine vertiefte Einsicht in Ihre Prozesse und hilft uns bei der Ortung von verborgenen Informations- und Wissens-Schätzen. Wir kombinieren diese Dienstleistungen auch mit Training-on-the-job und erzielen damit einen wirklich praxisrelevanten Know-How-Transfer in beide Richtungen.

about_us.headline: About Us
about_us.mainContent: K2 Informatics GmbH is an IT service company. We plan and develop software solutions for the automation and optimization of operational processes. One of our strengths is the integration of existing heterogeneous applications into a modern and uniform whole.

firstRow.title: We want for you ...
list: Work hard on your project and on us

secondRow.title: And thereby
list: Honest and friendly with each other
